reviews.review: Шикарно просто Шикарно.

A sequel to Half Life 2. Pretty short, so get it on a sale. Recommended if you want the content for Garry's Mod or if you're a big fan of the game and want to play the whole franchise.

Recommended, although too short.
8/10

Episode one is less of an add-on or expansion as it is a direct continuation of the base game's story, picking up seconds after it ended. This means two things. 

The positive is that it expands on the top class gameplay and world of Half-Life 2 while introducing us to some new enemy types and new areas. The negative is that paying €7 to experience the next 4 hours of the story feels a little cheap, like it should have been included in the base game.

For better or worse, Episode one is a necessary but very short component to Half-Life 2 and a welcome addition to those who crave more of it. 8/10
Bardzo krótki epizod jeżeli ktoś się postara to można go ukończyć w 2h. Ale nie idźmy w ilość ale jakość. Ponieważ mimo swojej krutkości warto kupić i przejść moja ocena to 8,5/10

Akcja pierwszego z epizodów rozpoczyna się bezpośrednio po wydarzeniach znanych z (podstawowego) Half-Life 2. Kto więc nie grał wcześniej w Half-Life 2 przed grą w Ep1 powinien nadrobić braki :) Jedną ze zmian, która dość szybko rzuca się w oczy w Ep1 jest wykorzystanie przez Valve nieco nowszej wersji silnika Source niż w Half-Life 2. Przekłada się to oczywiście na trochę ładniejszą oprawę graficzną. Poza tym Ep1 kontynuuje dobre tradycje Half-Life 2 i jest to również bardzo porządna gra tyle, że znacznie krótsza. Chociaż akurat wg mnie długość Ep1 jest dopowiednia (nie za długa i nie za krótka) tym bardziej, że jest ona w jakimś stopniu uzasadniona fabularnie.
逃离17号城
The next great installment of our late hero Dr. Freemen.

All in all, it's a nice short advancement where Half-Life 2 left off. Keyword being SHORT. You could probably play through this at a normal pace and complete it in about 2.5 hours. Nonetheless, still worth a play if you yearn for more after Half-Life 2.
不好玩

Quarter-Life 2

Basically a miniature half life 2. Good fun if you liked HL2.

I can't complain about Episode 1 because it is more Half-Life but it is definitely weaker than the full game. Feeling more like a tacked on epilogue, Episode 1 feels like it acts merely to connect the end of the core game to the next major part of the story. What does stand out about this game is the character interaction. The improvement of NPC intelligence means that your companion throughout the entire episode is actually effective in gameplay, not to mention keeping you company in the darker, lonelier parts of the episode. This is what I feel this game was to be, however, a smaller scope character driven adventure. For this I can applauded the game because there are some parts of the story that truly make you care as if your companion were real flesh and blood.

[b]Full review below if you want to check it out:[/b]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ne5qIlE8D9k

Эпизод первый это, что-то промежуточное, не очень важное, но при этом играющее роль. Он короткий, впринципе его можно пройти за 2-3 часа. Он не такой насыщенный как half-life 2 и не содержит нововведений как half-life 2. episode 2.
Но при этом играет роль, именно в нём мы узнаем судьбу Фримана и Аликс, также не забудем про пса. Как они выбирались из сити-17. Больше всего эпизод 1 запомнился сложностями в плане врагов, боссы были действительно сильней чем в любой другой части, что добавляло игре интересности. Несколько новых уровней и ползанья, чтобы включить электричество, немного надоели, но эпизод 1 смог отстоять своё.

Он не принёс нам нового, но смог дать ещё одну часть незабываемого сюжета.

Ótima continuação do game Half-Life 2. O Episodio 1 é um game muito equilibrado, a jogabilidade permanece muito boa no mesmo estilo do game anterior, a atmosfera do game está excelente principalmente em ambientes escuros com uso da lanterna gerando bastante tensão. 

Os gráficos são os mesmos de HL2 e são bem legais mesmo nos dias de hoje. Os puzzles não chegam a ser dificeis porém ainda divertidos. Fica evidente que a série Half-Life deixou um legado para diversos tipos de games que viriam no futuro (FPS, Puzzles, Terror...)

A lot of people say the original is always better then the sqeual. I have to disagree. This is a game who does it right when they say "Alright god dammit we're gonna make a second chapter of this game and where gonna do it right!". There is so much to say about this game, the massive cult following it's gain to it's various RP servers it's spun off in GMOD. It's massive amount of lore to it's amazing combat system. It's nothing but amazing! There is so much to learn, so much to enjoy, so much to love! I know I sound like I'm kissing ♥♥♥ when I say this but this game makes me love valve more than anything. Either being the same badass scientist that crawled his way out of that hell hole known as Black Mesa smashing Crowbars into the ugly guls of Alien Monsters now into the Gasmask of Metro Police Officers that opress a civilian populace under a Universal Union Banner in the name of "Civil Status". Or riding around in a scrapped sports car with a rather attractive but at the same time a TRUE strong and independant female character Alyx. You feel like a badass actually doing something for a resistance, no, a revolution for mankind being enslaved by a Alien Empire. This game is perfect. This game is art.

This game is of course a follow-up on the Half-Life 2 adventures, and what exactly happened after the tower ending in which there was no conclusion to in the main installment. This exact episode will take you through the story about the escape from the great area (and tower) before it explodes completely, which would mean the death of Freeman, Alyx, and pretty much everyone in a great scale area, so it is about escaping ASAP. Afterwards it will take you through the pressing task of saving as many remaining citizens as possible from City 17 before the - again - explosion. Essentially, it is all about escaping City 17. 

A must if you´re a fan of the series. This episode in particular is only really challenging in the end when it starts firing all sorts of enemies at your face, but is fairly casual-friendly up until the ending chapters - at least on normal and "expert". Well, not so much on expert. ;)

Have fun!

Эта игра - хороший связующий мостик между HL2 и HL2 Ep2. Вся часть представляет собой по сути побег из Сити 17. Жаль, что по продолжительности не такая как HL2. Но, как говорится, краткость - сестра таланта. В целом добротный эпизод.

본편의 놀라움과 재미는 없이
그저 짜증만 남았다.

무기 부분에 대해서는 아쉬움이 남으며
레벨 디자인은 이게 정말 본편의 그게 맞나 싶을 정도로
"너무나"형편 없었다.

레벨 디자인은 "하층민 "이라는 단어 하나만으로도 충분하다고 생각하며
(모르는 이들을 위해 설명하자면 "하층민 "챕터는 챕터 내내 어두컴컴한 지하실이며
챕터 막바지에는 헤드 크랩 좀비들이 개떼로 몰려온다.
사실상 허구한 날 손전등을 켜놔야 하는데 그 손전등도 제한시간이 있으며 충전하려면 
잠시 꺼놔야 한다.)

무기에 대해 이야기를 해보자.

보통 게임에서는 약한 무기부터 시작해서 조금씩 강한 무기를 플레이어에게 쥐여준다.
하프 2가 그랬던 것처럼.

하나 에피소드 1에서는 처음부터 최강의 무기인 슈퍼 중력 건을 쥐여주더니
나중에 다시 중력 건으로 되돌아갔을 때는 탄약이 이상하게 너무나도 부족했던 것 같다.
(이게 "하층민 "챕터와 시너지를 이루어 재미는 둘째치고 그냥 짜증만 났다.) 
이제 탄약이 안정적으로 됐다 싶었는데
떡 하니 올라오는 스탭롤...

그리고 게임 내내 알릭스 밴스와 동행하게 되는데
개인적으로 "정말 마음에 안 드는 캐릭터 "라는 느낌을 받았다.

정작 본인이 할 줄 알고 하는 것도 문 여는 것 말고는 없으면서
뭘 할 때마다 "저와 박사님이,.." "우리가..."등등..

한마디로 "하는 것도 없는 놈이 앞장서서 생색낸다"라는 느낌이었다.
바하4의 애슐리도 짐은 됐을지언정 저런 진상 짓은 안 했는데..


스토리도 딱히 뭔가 밝혀지거나 정리된 게 없다.


정말 본인이 "나는 하프라이프의 모든 걸 알고 해봐야겠어!"같은 열성팬이 아닌 이상은
그냥 하지 말라고 권하고 싶다.

스토리가 궁금한 유저들은 이거 하나만 알면 된다.


고든 프리맨과 알릭스 밴스가 18번 지구에서 탈출했습니다.

Шутер игра

Half-Life 2: Episode One ist definitiv ein guter Teil dieses Universums, kann aber das schwindelerregende Niveau des Hauptspiels nicht erreichen. 
Das größte Problem für mich bei dieser Erweiterung ist wie begrenzt, eng und über-linear sich alles anfühlt. Das bahnbrechende Leveldesign mit neuen Szenarien und Herausforderungen aus dem Hauptspiel sind mehr oder minder verschwunden und Episode One wird leider zu einem zu ballerlastigen Kurztrip in das Universum von Gordon Freeman. 

Auch storytechnisch gibt es recht wenig neues zu entdecken. Positiv zu vermerken in diesem Bereich bleibt die wachsende Beziehung zu Alex, die in diesem Abenteuer eine zentrale Rolle spielt. Leider wird die doch recht kurze Spielzeit auch zu häufig durch Konversationen unterbrochen - gerade der erste Teil ist pausenloses Stop-and-Go, sodass man ständig das Bedürfnis hat, endlich von der Leine gelassen zu werden. 

Bei alle dem bleibt Episode One immer noch ein Half-Life Titel und so sehr man auch spürt, dass es nicht ganz die Erwartung erfüllt, so viel Spaß hat man dennoch während des gesamten Spieldurchlaufs. Das Ende macht einen auch wirklich gespannt, was einen wohl in Episode Two erwartet.

An interesting add-on to the Half Life 2 franchise.

Gordon Freeman and Alex are saved from the ending of HL2 (not going to reveal too much there) and must excape from the giant citidel. They encounter tons of Combine along the way and must solve a lot of devious problems and puzzles to escape. They bond along the way as well.

HLE1 pushes the action of HL2 but does not do a whole bunch with the story. You get a wider perspective of the world as Gordon and Alex rush out of the citidel but still not much backstory to either of them, any of the other characters or the Combine. 

The action is great, everything else is great, it's just that this chapter is not the top of the top in terms of what you usually get with a Half Life game.

Still, you must play through it if you want the whole story.

8/10

I played Episode One for the first time last month for like an hour and forgot about it till I completed it in a single playthrough yesterday. All I can say is, and I don't want to get slaughtered for this, I was pretty underwhelmed. Maybe it's the short campaign with very little significance to the storyline. Yeah, well you got some data you weren't supposed to see and now you need to hoof till the train station battling hoards of enemies. That's the plot in one sentence. Not much happened here, but the only reason I am underwhelmed is because I expected much more reading other reviews. It was a decent additional content to the main game, and Episode Two is supposed to be way better, so looking forward to it.

Gameplay wise, if you liked Half-Life 2, you won't find any difference here. Graphics are marginally better with HDR, I guess. We've come too far to even notice the difference anyway. But we don't play Half-Life games for the graphics, do we?

Overall, I'd recommend it for maintaining the continuity and for storyline reasons.

More of the same Half-Life 2 goodness. And that ain't a bad thing!

Chester Alan Arthur (October 5, 1829 – November 18, 1886) was an American attorney and politician who served as the 21st President of the United States (1881–85); he succeeded James A. Garfield upon the latter's assassination. At the outset, Arthur struggled to overcome a slightly negative reputation, which stemmed from his early career in politics as part of New York's Republican political machine. He succeeded by embracing the cause of civil service reform. His advocacy for, and subsequent enforcement of, the Pendleton Civil Service Reform Act was the centerpiece of his administration.

Arthur was born in Fairfield, Vermont, grew up in upstate New York, and practiced law in New York City. He served as quartermaster general in the New York Militia during the American Civil War. Following the war, he devoted more time to Republican politics and quickly rose in the political machine run by New York Senator Roscoe Conkling. Appointed by President Ulysses S. Grant to the lucrative and politically powerful post of Collector of the Port of New York in 1871, Arthur was an important supporter of Conkling and the Stalwart faction of the Republican Party. In 1878, the new president, Rutherford B. Hayes, fired Arthur as part of a plan to reform the federal patronage system in New York. When Garfield won the Republican nomination for president in 1880, Arthur, an eastern Stalwart, was nominated for vice president to balance the ticket.

After just half a year as vice president, Arthur found himself in the executive mansion due to the assassination of his predecessor. To the surprise of reformers, Arthur took up the cause of reform, though it had once led to his expulsion from office. He signed the Pendleton Act into law and strongly enforced its provisions. He gained praise for his veto of a Rivers and Harbors Act that would have appropriated federal funds in a manner he thought excessive. He presided over the rebirth of the United States Navy, but was criticized for failing to alleviate the federal budget surplus, which had been accumulating since the end of the Civil War.

Suffering from poor health, Arthur made only a limited effort to secure the Republican Party's nomination in 1884; he retired at the close of his term. Journalist Alexander McClure later wrote, "No man ever entered the Presidency so profoundly and widely distrusted as Chester Alan Arthur, and no one ever retired ... more generally respected, alike by political friend and foe."[3] Although his failing health and political temperament combined to make his administration less active than a modern presidency, he earned praise among contemporaries for his solid performance in office. The New York World summed up Arthur's presidency at his death in 1886: "No duty was neglected in his administration, and no adventurous project alarmed the nation."[4] Mark Twain wrote of him, "[I]t would be hard indeed to better President Arthur's administration."[5] Over the 20th and 21st centuries, however, Arthur's reputation mostly faded among the public.

Le titre à vraiment le cul entre deux chaises entre le simple add-on et la suite : d'un côté, il utilise le même moteur graphique, s'arrête juste après Half Life 2, coute très peu cher (durant les soldes Steam il est à 1 € 50) est beaucoup plus cours et utilise le même moteur graphique. Mais de l'autre, il a été développé un an après, possède un début un milieu et une fin, de nouveaux monstres et un gameplay bien à lui, puisqu'il s'agit ici, de s'enfuir avec un PNJ qui vous suivra durant toute la mission. 

Et contrairement à ce que j'ai lu par-ci ou par-là, non, je ne trouve pas Alyx reloue. Pour avoir joué à Résident Evil 4 (merci Ashley) ou Zelda Ocarina of Time ("Hé, listen") nous avons ici une alliée compétente, qui tire sur les monstres et nous rend service.

Comme tout bon add-on, il poursuit l'histoire tout en poussant vraiment plus les mécaniques du jeu. En effet, un succès nous encourage à ne jamais se servir de ses armes de feu et à utiliser n'utiliser que le gravity gun. Et si c'est assez stressant à la fin du jeu, c'est une idée de gameplay pas désagréable, qui offre un certain challenge, étant donné qu'on commence à trier mentalement les objets du décors en fonction de leur poids et de la façon dont on va tirer dessus. De plus, deux autres succès sont aussi en lien avec cet objet, nous forçant à envoyer des voitures sur des fourmillions ou nous faisant cramer un maximum de "crabhead zombies." Là encore, il y a une dimension "originalité ludique" où l'on sent que les développeurs testent d'autres formes de gameplay. 

Le scénario, s'il est peu épais permet quand même d'allonger l'univers et reste relativement cohérent. On pourra se dire que le jeu

It's not nearly as long as Half-Life 2, which explains why its Episode One instead of Half-Life 3. It's a solid game that extends HL2 and really just leaves you wanting more, which is good because there's Episode Two.

Easy 100%

(10/10)^2 Episode One

Very nice game. The episode 1 ended on a cliffhanger so I am very excited to start episode 2 soon. 

(I have reviewed the previous half life games as well. You can check them on my profile if you want to)

Продолжение серии Half-Life. На этот раз вы будете проделывать весь путь с Аликс Вэнс. Может это хорошо, а может и нет, ведь вы не должны дать Аликс погибнуть.

Задача игры - выбраться из сити 17 до того, как его разнесет на куски. К сожалению вы останетесь без приманки для жуков, и муравьиные львы вновь станут враждебными.

Вам, перед побегом из города, предстоит вернуться в разрушающуюся цитадель, чтобы стабилизировать ее ядро и получить достаточно времени на побег.
Аликс будет вам помогать, делая шаровые мины дружелюбными, сидя на снайперской позиции или просто расстреливая врагов из пистолета, как из автомата. В определенный момент игры она возьмет дробовик.
Однако будут в игре и моменты, где аликс оставит вас, но всегда будет поблизости (например прятатся на складе, пока вы сражаетесь с финальным боссом).

精雕细琢的续集。可以叫 《半条命2：逃出17号城》
半条命2的结尾反应炉的损坏引起剧烈爆炸，波及到爱丽克斯与戈登。此时时间停止，G-Man再次出现，称赞戈登所作的表现，并再次将戈登封印起来，但爱丽克斯的命运仍属未知数。这个结局使我陷入深思，我几乎好几天都在思考在半条命的结局里。
Half-Life 2: Episode One 解答了我这个疑惑。
真希望V社最后可以把所有剧情穿起来，做成一部大作，使这部作品更加完美。

Source Engine做出来的画面非常干净，游戏性也简洁易玩。美中不足的是Source Engine的根本性缺陷，不能破坏所有建筑物。
Source Engine 的物理性和可拓展性也是绝对世界顶尖的.希望今后的 Source Engine 2 能有更长远的发展。

73/100分
剧情紧接hl2。
玩法和地图上没有创新。布景压抑。
因为地图设计原因，NPC经常挡路，很烦。
剧情比想象中要长很多，还是用心写了故事的。
More challenging than Half-Life 2....but too damn short. Worth buying only when is on sale

This episode's story isn't that charming like main story from Half Life 2, but it replaces with puzzle that is nailing my feeling all the time. Even though Half Life 2 : episode one seems not to popular, I would say it is one of the good games from Valve if you're a big fan of half life. Gameplay is pretty smooth, and the most important thing is puzzles aren't that annoying to solve; you can figure it out in 5-10 minutes at least because everything that will make you to pass the mission is in the same scene. I strongly recommend this game for single player - it is fun and worthy of your money :)

Şu ana kadar Half Life 2 Serisini en az 4-5 kere bitirdim kesinlikle verilen parayı hak eden bir oyun, paranız varsa ve boşa harcamak istemiyorsanız kesinlikle tavsiye ederim. Çünkü bir kez başına geçince 2-3 saat kalkmayacağınız bir oyundur.
A great first episode to the two episodic adventure after Half-Life 2, it continues the story after you destroyed the core and it gives you the the weapons you are familiar with.
